meanings.sent1: The lost puppy was rescuable by the kind animal shelter.

meanings.definition: Able to be saved from harm or danger.
meanings.sent1: The rescuable hiker was found by the search and rescue team just in time.
meanings.sent2: The life jacket made the swimmer feel more rescuable in the rough waters.
